components.description:
A grape bunch, as cut from the vine and used to make wine. Depicted as red (purple-colored) grapes.

During 2024 this emoji began to be used on Tiktok to reference a phonetically similar term for a serious form of assault.
components.title: Grapes

description:
A grape bunch, as cut from the vine and used to make wine. Depicted as red (purple-colored) grapes.

During 2024 this emoji began to be used on Tiktok to reference a phonetically similar term for a serious form of assault.
title: Grapes

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Fruit and vegetable symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Grapes that¬†are commonly found as red grapes (purple-colored) or white grapes (green-colored). Used¬†to create wine. Grapes was approved as p http://emojipedia.org/grapes/
emoji_net_data.name: grapes

bn:00111540a: Having or denoting the characteristic taste of sugar
Having the taste characteristic of sugar or honey.

bn:13673950a: Containing grapes or having a grape flavor.

bn:13673951a: Of a dark purplish red colour.

bn:00087460v: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.

bn:00041400n: The plant, a vine of genus Vitis, on which grapes grow
A small, round, smooth-skinned edible fruit, usually purple, red, or green, that grows in bunches on certain vines.
A grape is a fruiting berry of the deciduous woody vines of the botanical genus Vitis.
A small, round, smooth-skinned edible fruit, usually purple, red, or green, that grows in bunches on vines of genus Vitis.
The plant on which grapes grow.
Any of numerous woody vines of genus Vitis bearing clusters of edible berries
Grapes are a fruit that grows in clusters on the perennial and deciduous woody vines of the genus Vitis.
Fruit of a plant belonging to the genus Vitis

bn:00036686n: The ripened reproductive body of a seed plant
Fruit, in broad terms, is a structure of a plant that contains its seeds.
The seed-bearing part of a plant, often edible, colourful/colorful and fragrant, produced from a floral ovary after fertilization.
A fully matured plant ovary with or without other floral or shoot parts united with it at maturity.
In botany, a fruit is a part of a flowering plant that derives from specific tissues of the flower, one or more ovaries, and in some cases accessory tissues.

bn:00080022n: An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting juice of grapes.
Wine is an alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes or other fruits.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
